footer.description: Sura isi na Exodus: Umufatanya bikorwa

about.quote1: Ikigo OLD Fox gitegura ingendo nyobokamana, kigafasha abantu ku giti cyabo n’amatsinda gusura ahantu hatagatifu ku isi hose. Ingendo zacu zigamije gufasha abantu gukura mu mwuka,Gusenga, kwiyumvamo no gusobanukirwa umuco. Dufasha gusura insengero za kera cyangwa imijyi mitagatifu, buri rugendo ruhuza abagenzi n’ukwemera kwabo n’imico yabo. Twitondera gutegura buri rugendo kugira ngo ubuzima bw’abagenzi bugende neza kandi bubashimishe.
about.quote2: Ingendo zacu zateguwe muburyo zitanga ubuzima bushya, zihuza kunoza umubano n’Imana no kwinjira mu muco gakondo. Abagenzi basura ahantu hafite amateka akomeye mu myemerere, bakagira uruhare mu mihango y’umuco gakondo, kandi bakungurana ibitekerezo n’abemera bagenzi babo. Izi ngendo zitera umuntu kongera gutekereza ku kwemera kwe, gutekereza ku buzima, no gusobanukirwa byimbitse iby’imyemerere, zigasiga n’urwibutso rutazibagirana mu bice by’isi bikomeye mu by’umwuka.

destinations.rwandaDescription: Menya umurage w'idini w'u Rwanda, uhuza umuco n'umwuka.
destinations.israelDescription: Menya  umurage ukungahaye wo mu mwuka wa Isiraheli n'ibiranga ahera.
destinations.turkeyDescription: Menya ahantu hera muri Turukiya, ihuriro ry'amadini ya kera.
destinations.egyptDescription: Menya ibitangaza byo mu mwuka bya Misiri hamwe n'insengero za kera.

service.title: Serivisi
service.subtitle: Serivisi Dutanga
service.description: Subiza amaso ku bimenyetso bitandukanye by’amadini no ku mibereho y’umwuka, bigaragaza umuco ukungahaye n’imigenzo gakondo. Suzuma insengero zera, za kiliziya za kera, n’amahema y’itorero arangwa n’amahoro, buri kimwe gifite inkuru z’imihango ya kera n’ukwizera gukomeye. Ujye mu minsi mikuru n’imigenzo y’umwuka ihuza abantu, ikwereke neza urugendo rw’ubumwe n’ukwemera abatuye isi bose bahuriyeho.

products.title: Ibicuruzwa
products.subtitle: Ibicuruzwa by'Amateka
products.discription: Sura biro yacu kugirango ugure ibicuruzwa by'idini bifite ireme mu buryo bwa hafi.

destinationr.turkeyDescription: Injira mu muco mwiza w'umurwa mukuru wa Turukiya.
destinationr.israelDescription: Tembera imihanda yuzuye ubuzima n'ubwiza y’Umujyi .

turkeyDescription.title: Turukiya (Istanbul):
turkeyDescription.short: Menya umurage w'idini muri Turukiya: sura Hagia Sophia ya Istanbul, Umusigiti w'Ubururu, Kiliziya ya Mutagatifu Yohani i Efeso, n'amazu y'amasengesho ya kera yo muri Cappadocia kugira ngo ukure mu by'umwuka.
turkeyDescription.full:
Tangira urugendo ruhanga amaso muri Turukiya, igihugu gifite amateka menshi y'idini. Tangirira i Istanbul, aho Iburasirazuba n'Iburengerazuba bihurira. Sura Hagia Sophia idasanzwe, yari katedrali n'umusigiti, ubu ni inzu ndangamurage, yerekana ubwubatsi bw'abaroma bw'igitangaza. Rambagira Umusigiti w'Ubururu, uzwi cyane kubera amategura y'ubururu n'ingoro zitangaje.
Nyuma, jya i Cappadocia, hazwi cyane kubera imisozi yihariye n'amazu y'amasengesho ya kera yuzuye amashusho meza. Menya Inzu Ndangamurage ya Goreme, aho UNESCO yita Umurage w'Isi.
Genda ujya i Efeso, aho ushobora gusura Kiliziya ya Mutagatifu Yohani n'ibyuya by'umujyi wa kera, bigaragaza uruhare rw'Ubukristo bwa mbere.
Ubusoza, sura Pamukkale, izwi cyane kubera imisozi yayo y'amazi n'ibyuya bya kera bya Hierapolis, bizwi cyane kubera amazi yayo ashyushye.

destination.name: Ingoro ya Kibeho
destination.description: Kibeho izwi cyane kubera ibonekerwa rya Bikira Mariya byatanzwe n'abakobwa batatu b'Abanyarwanda mu myaka ya 1980. Iyi ngoro ni imwe mu ngoro z'ingenzi cyane zo kujya gusengera ku Gatolika mu Rwanda.

destination.name: Urwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Kigali
destination.description: Gusura Urwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Kigali ni ngombwa kugira ngo umuntu asobanukirwe n'amateka y'u Rwanda yo vuba aha. Kandi bigaragaza ubuzima bw'Abakristo benshi bapfuye muri Jenoside yo mu 1994.

destination.name: Gusura Katedrali ya Nyundo
destination.description: Katedrali ya Nyundo ni imwe mu nyubako nini kandi z'ingenzi z'Abakristo mu Rwanda, itanga ahantu ho gutekereza no kwibuka amateka y'Ubukristo mu gihugu.

recentlyVisited.title: Urugendo rwa Vuba Twasuye
recentlyVisited.mapPrompt: Kanda kuri Koresha ikarita kugira ngo ukurikirane aho hantu

rwandaDescription.title: Kibeho (Rwanda):
rwandaDescription.short: Kibeho, iherereye mu Karere ka Nyaruguru, mu Rwanda, ni ahantu hera hazwi cyane kubera ibonekerwa rya Bikira Mariya, hakurura abapilgrims bashaka kuruhuka mu by'umwuka hagati y'imisozi miremire n'umuco mwiza.
rwandaDescription.full:
Menya urugendo ruhindura ubuzima mu Rwanda usura ahantu h'ingenzi mu by'idini. Tangira urugendo rwawe i Kibeho, hazwi cyane kubera ibonekerwa rya Bikira Mariya byatangajwe, bikurura ibihumbi by'abapilgrims buri mwaka. Ahantu hatekanye n'imisozi itatse neza bitanga ahantu heza ho gutekereza no gusenga.

Nyuma, jya i Musanze, aho abamisiyoneri ba mbere bashyizeho urufatiro rw'Ubukristo muri ako gace. Rambagira amatorero yo mu gace kandi winjire mu mateka y'ukwemera muri ako gace.

Ntuzibagirwe Ikiyaga cya Kivu, ahantu heza ho gutekereza, aho ushobora kunezererwa n'amahoro yo ku nkombe zacyo.

Ubusoza, sura Urwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Kigali, ahantu hahangayikishije hatanga inyigisho ku mateka y'u Rwanda, hagaragaza insanganyamatsiko z'imbabazi n'ubwiyunge biri mu mizi y'inyigisho za Gikristo.

Mu rugendo rwawe rwose, ujye ushyikirana n'umuco w'Abanyarwanda wakira neza, wumve uburyohe bw'ibiryo gakondo, kandi wishimire imisozi itatse neza, bituma urugendo rwawe rw'idini ruba rwiza kandi rudashobora kwibagirana.

destinations.name: Kibeho
destinations.description: Hazwi kubera ibonekerwa rya Bikira Mariya, hakurura abapilgrims bashaka kuruhuka mu by'umwuka.

destinations.name: Musanze
destinations.description: Rambagira amatorero yo mu gace kandi winjire mu mateka y'ukwemera muri ako gace.

destinations.name: Ikiyaga cya Kivu
destinations.description: Ahantu heza ho gutekereza, aho ushobora kunezererwa n'amahoro yo ku nkombe zacyo.

destinations.name: Urwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Kigali
destinations.description: Ahantu hahangayikishije hatanga inyigisho ku mateka y'u Rwanda, hagaragaza insanganyamatsiko z'imbabazi n'ubwiyunge.

egyptDescription.title: Egiputa (Kayiro):
egyptDescription.short: Menya umurage w'Egiputa: sura Piramide Nini, insengero za kera, imisigiti ya Isilamu, Umusozi Sinayi, n'amasoko arangwa n'ubuzima bwuzuye amateka n'umuco.
egyptDescription.full: Tangira urugendo rw'umwuka muri Egiputa, igihugu gikungahaye mu mateka y'idini. Tangirira urugendo rwawe muri Kayiro, aho ushobora gusura Piramide Nini za Giza na Sfingi, ibimenyetso by'ubwami bwa Egiputa ya kera. Rambagira Kayiro ya Isilamu, aho hari imisigiti irangwa n'ubwiza nka Umusigiti wa Al-Azhar na Umusigiti wa Sultan Hassan, bigaragaza umurage wa Isilamu w'igihugu. Hanyuma, jya i Luxor, hazwi nk'ahantu hanini cyane ho kureba ibintu bya kera mu karere. Sura Urusengero rwa Karnak n'Ikibaya cy'Abami, aho abami benshi bahambwe. Ntuzibagirwe Umusozi Sinayi, aho bizwi ko Mose yahawe Amategeko Icumi, n'Urusengero rwa Mutagatifu Katerina, ahantu hari ku rutonde rw'Umurage w'Isi wa UNESCO. Soza urugendo rwawe muri Alexandria, usura Imva za Kom el Shoqafa n'Igihome cya Qaitbay, bitanga inyigisho ku mateka y'ubukristo n'ubuyisilamu by'umujyi. Ishimire ibiryo by'ahantu n'umuco urangwa n'ubuzima mu rugendo rwawe rwose.

destinations.name: Kayiro
destinations.description: Sura Piramide Nini za Giza zizwi cyane, Sfingi, kandi urambagire Kayiro ya Isilamu ifite imisigiti irangwa n'ubwiza.

destinations.name: Luxor
destinations.description: Rambagira ahantu hanini cyane ho kureba ibintu bya kera ku isi, harimo Urusengero rwa Karnak n'Ikibaya cy'Abami.

destinations.name: Umusozi Sinayi
destinations.description: Sura ahantu hizwi ko Mose yahawe Amategeko Icumi kandi urambagire Urusengero rwa Mutagatifu Katerina.

destinations.name: Alexandria
destinations.description: Menya Imva za Kom el Shoqafa n'Igihome cya Qaitbay, bitanga inyigisho ku mateka y'umujyi akungahaye.

mainContent.title: ISRAEL
mainContent.subtitle: ISRAEL (Tel Aviv):
mainContent.description: Sura Israel kugira ngo urebe amateka yayo: ahantu hera ha Yerusalemu, imisozi ya Dead Sea, n'imijyi ikomeye nka Tel Aviv na Haifa irakutegereje.
mainContent.israelDescription: Tangira urugendo rw'umwuka muri Israel, umutima w'amadini atatu akomeye ku isi. Tangirira i Yerusalemu, usure Inkike y'Iburengerazuba, igisigaye cya Temperi ya Kabiri, na Dome of the Rock, urusengero rw'Abayisilamu rurangwa. Reba Kiliziya y'Imva Ntagatifu, yizerwaho ko ari aho Yesu yabambwe kandi akazuka. Nyuma, jya i Betelehemu, aho ushobora gusura Kiliziya y'Ivuka, yerekana aho Yesu yavukiye. Genda i Nazareti kureba Basilika y'Ivugwa, ahantu h'ingenzi h'urugendo rw'Abakristo. Ntuzibagirwe ubwiza bw'Inyanja ya Galilaya, aho ushobora gutekereza ku nkuru za Bibiliya. Ku iherezo, uryoherwe kuri Dead Sea, ahantu hepfo kurusha ahandi ku isi, hazwi kubera imbaraga zaho zo gukiza. Umve ibiryo by'aho n'umuco ukomeye, bituma urugendo rwawe rw'umwuka muri Israel ruba rw'ubukungu kandi rudashira mu bwenge.

jerusalem.name: Yerusalemu
jerusalem.description: Sura ahantu hera nk'Inkike y'Iburengerazuba, Dome of the Rock, na Kiliziya y'Imva Ntagatifu.

bethlehem.name: Betelehemu
bethlehem.description: Sura Kiliziya y'Ivuka, yerekana aho Yesu yavukiye.

nazareth.name: Nazareti
nazareth.description: Reba Basilika y'Ivugwa, ahantu h'ingenzi h'urugendo rw'Abakristo.

seaOfGalilee.name: Inyanja ya Galilaya
seaOfGalilee.description: Tekereza ku nkuru za Bibiliya kuri iyi nyanja yuje amahoro.

deadSea.name: Inyanja Ipfuye
deadSea.description: Umve ahantu hepfo kurusha ahandi ku isi, hazwi kubera imbaraga zaho zo gukiza.
